metadata.title: CVE-2018-14351 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mutt before 1.10.1 and NeoMutt before2018-07-16. imap/command.c mishandles a long IMAP status mailbox literalcount size.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14351` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.9.4-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mutt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-3ubuntu0.1').
